stories.original_headline: The deep ocean has a missing link and scientists finally found it
stories.original_summary: Scientists have uncovered why big predators like sharks spend so much time in the ocean’s twilight zone. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Secret of Deep Ocean Creatures!
stories.fantasy_story: The Circle of Ocean Wizards has finally unveiled a grand mystery of the abyssal depths. They found that wondrous scale-folk, like the great pomfret, link the creatures of the deep to those of the surface. These creatures rise nightly to feed, creating a vital bridge for all life in the waters.

stories.original_headline: Time runs faster on Mars and scientists just proved it
stories.original_summary: Thanks to Einstein’s relativity, time flows differently on Mars than on Earth. NIST scientists have now nailed down the difference, showing that Mars clocks tick slightly faster—and fluctuate over the Martian year. stories.fantasy_headline: Stargazers Reveal Time Flows Differently on the Red Planet!
stories.fantasy_story: Cosmic Sages from the Grand Observatory have proven a startling truth: time itself flows faster on the distant Red Planet than in our own realm. Their enchanted chronometers show that moments there pass more swiftly, though with small changes through its year. This discovery is crucial for future astral journeys and sending messages between worlds.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Enchanted Game Box Folds Like a Tome!
stories.fantasy_story: The ingenious One-Netbook Clan has crafted a marvelous new hand-held amusement device! Named the 'OneXSugar Pouch,' it features a wondrous folding scrying mirror, unlike any seen before. This allows adventurers to carry vivid enchanted screens in a small pouch, ready for play anywhere.
